body:
Another year survived! The President thank you for your continued contribution to the military-industrial complex!

Keep doing what you do best!


Hope your special day is going swell! Today, America recognizes your stalwart commitment the beacon of freedom in a bleak world!

Thank you for your service and enjoy your birthday!


Always wishing the best for you! Because what's best for you is best for us, too!

We thank you for your continued support! Have a great birthday!
valedictions:
Sincerly,
Best regards,
Kind regards,
Best wishes,
